name: Ginger
val: early 30s, ethnically ambiguous - smart, striking, and tough cross between a young Jennifer Lopez and Velma Kelly
long: She wears a long sleeved black dress, cheetah heels, Jackie O. sunglasses and head scarf. She smokes.
Style: futuristic film noir anime comic book high contrast illustration

name: Jamal
val: 32, burly, black, doo rag, tats, a scar on his neck — a hooded cross between 50 Cent and Mike Tyson

name: Hadji
val: 26, swarthy, angsty, nihilistic heart throb. He wears a black duster that reveals his bare chest, long hair, beard, goth necklaces, facial piercings, and dark eye liner. He’s strung out — smoking and drinking from a sake flask.
long: is surrounded by gorgeous fawning women. He wears a black duster that reveals his bare chest, long hair, beard, goth necklaces, facial piercings, and dark eye liner.

name: Roxie
long: emerges from the shadows in a silvery white bob wig with black headband. Her bangs, which fall over her wrap-around sunglasses, partially conceal her face, but not the beauty mark above her lip. She wears a sparkling, skin-tight catsuit.

name: CEO
val: 40s, a fierce mix of Missy Elliot’s gold track suit style, gold crown, shutter shades, and Wanda Sykes don’t-mess attitude
long: is now seen, sitting on a EXECUTIVE THRONE made from melted AK-47s. She descends the stairs. a gleaming gold grill terrifyingly large and protruding

name: Vivian
val: 20s/30s, ambiguous race, a dangerous allure in secretary chic

name: Hit Squad
val: (20s, any ethnicity, striking killing machines dressed in sleek outfits)
long: the CEO’s security quartet of sexy assassins Their look is bondage-secretary chic, down to their TRI-BLADE HAND CLAWS.

name: Mysterioso
val: a mysterious FIGURE, face hidden in a velvet hooded robe.

name: DJ
val: A hip global DJ with mirror glasses

name: Masked Troopers
val: A squad of asian troopers wearing masks
20s-50s, mix genders and ethnicities, epitomizing corporate cool with deadpan stares, smoldering gazes and perfectly coiffed hair
